mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.login_date AS "loginDate", a.status AS "status", a.usernum AS "usernum", a.groupnum AS "groupnum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_account( id, name, login_date, status, usernum, groupnum, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{loginDate}, #{status}, #{usernum}, #{groupnum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tl_account SET id = #{id}, name = #{name}, login_date = #{loginDate}, status = #{status}, usernum = #{usernum}, groupnum = #{groupnum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tl_account SET status = 'ready', update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE status = 'run'
update tl_account t set usernum=(select count(distinct userid) from tl_job_user c where c.account=t.id)
update tl_account t set groupnum=(select count(distinct chatid) from tl_chat c where c.account=t.id)
